organization.name: AIChecklist.io
organization.description: AI-powered task management platform with professional templates and AIDOMO assistant

software.name: AIChecklist.io
software.description: AI-powered task management platform with 226+ professional templates, AIDOMO assistant, voice authentication, and smart calendar integration

acceptedAnswer.text: AIChecklist.io is an AI-powered task management platform featuring 226+ professional templates, AIDOMO AI assistant, voice authentication, and smart calendar integration for enhanced productivity.

mainEntity.name: How does AIDOMO AI assistant work?

acceptedAnswer.text: AIDOMO is an intelligent AI assistant that helps you create tasks, schedule events, prioritize work, and optimize your productivity through natural language conversations and smart suggestions.
Yes, our voice authentication uses enterprise-grade biometric technology with adaptive learning and health monitoring for secure, convenient access to your account.
We offer 226+ professional checklist templates covering business, startups, healthcare, education, technology, and many other industries and use cases.

howto.name: How to Create an AI-Powered Checklist
howto.description: Step-by-step guide to creating intelligent checklists using AIChecklist.io's AI features and templates

step.name: Sign up for AIChecklist.io
step.text: Create your free account at AIChecklist.io with email or voice authentication

step.name: Choose a template or create from scratch
step.text: Browse 226+ professional templates or start with a blank checklist

step.name: Use AIDOMO AI assistant
step.text: Ask AIDOMO to suggest tasks, optimize priorities, or schedule items automatically

step.name: Customize and organize
step.text: Add categories, set priorities, include timers, and organize with drag-and-drop

step.name: Schedule and track progress
step.text: Use the smart calendar to schedule tasks and track completion with achievements
